title: Predict an Author (Neural Network, NLP)
description: Neural network model for author prediction from text features. Includes model architecture discussion and annotated analysis.

title: Drone Delivery: MST + TSP Optimization
description: Graph optimization project implementing MST construction, heuristic TSP, and optimal TSP using branch-and-bound. Live demo shows algorithm behavior on representative test cases.

title: Bioinformatics + LLMs Research
description: Research project exploring retrieval-augmented generation for bioinformatics question answering using LLMs.

title: Euchre Game Engine (C++)
description: Interactive Euchre game engine with AI players, rule enforcement, and score tracking.

title: Forum Post Classifier
description: Text classification system that predicts post authorship (student vs instructor). Live demo shows classification outputs on published test inputs.

title: German Gas Market Analysis
description: Exploratory data analysis of German gas consumption trends with narrative-driven visualizations.

title: Image Resizer (Content-Aware Seam Carving)
description: Image resizing system demonstrating content-aware seam carving. Live demo visualizes seam selection, removal, and resized outputs.

title: IMDb Data Analysis Report
description: Exploratory analysis and modeling of IMDb movie data with statistical insights.

title: Letterman Word Morph Solver
description: Shortest-path word transformation solver using efficient graph search. Live demo shows transformation paths for published test cases.

title: Log Manager
description: Command-driven log querying system with indexed searches and excerpt list management. Live demo replays spec command scripts and outputs.

title: Michigan Medicine Research Poster
description: Healthcare data analysis project presented as a research poster and report.

title: Stock Market Simulator
description: Market simulation engine processing buy/sell orders with trade matching, medians, trader summaries, and time-traveler analysis. Live demo shows full output modes.

title: Text Generation with a Homemade LSTM
description: From-scratch character-level LSTM for text generation, including training and inference.

title: MRI Alzheimer’s Detection (MDST)
description: Deep learning pipeline for Alzheimer’s detection from MRI scans with Grad-CAM explainability and a live Streamlit demo.
